recentChanges: We’ve been working on improvements so that you can have a better user experience while using Hostelworld’s App! This update also includes some bug fixing.
comments: ["Great app that makes searching and booking easier! It also allows you to meet with other people in chats beforehand. I absolutely love this app and use it whenever I solo travel. Heck, some of these places, I'd even have a friend book their own stay with me! So worth it for socialization. You just have to do your research on the hostels themselves because hostelworld essentially is creating a search engine and a profile that allows you to connect with hostels around you!","I used to love this app, but it just updated and seems to have gotten rid of all the features I loved the most. You can no longer save favorites or make lists of hostels which is SO frustrating. Also, you used to be able to click the location and read written directions on how to get to the hostel from the owners before you book. It was so helpful seeing thos instructions before booking, not just having Google maps.","They absolutely need to bring back the ability to create lists and save favorites. This is how I plan my trips ahead of time, and I've actually lost a ton of my research for a trip I've got coming up next week. I have no idea why they would have removed this. You also can't see a map of locations anymore, so it's fairly useless to try and book a decent location without having something else open to check every single one. I'll be using a different app until they fix this.","Used to be a big fan of this app, but suddenly all my lists for planning upcoming trips are gone--i had spent hours reviewing properties & bookmarking the best places. Just gone & I need to book in the next few days! SO FRUSTRATING! Can no longer view any of the properties I've stayed at previously or even the cities or countries. Clearly didn't care at all about the user's needs when designing this garbage update. I dont have any reason to use this app anymore. I'll look for something else.","I used to love this app and used it consistently for travel throughout 2019 and beyond till now. They recently did an overhaul of the app design and they took away Favoriting and having lists of hostels of the ones you favorited. It now makes it so much more difficult to keep track of the ones you want to stay in, the ones you liked when reading descriptions, and harder to narrow down where to stay when you can't click the simple heart to favorite a hostel and see it when scrolling through."]

title: Polarsteps - Travel Tracker
description:
Plan, track, and relive your travels. Record your route automatically, keeping your phone in your pocket and eyes on the world.

Over 5M+ travelers have chosen Polarsteps to create and capture their adventures. This all-in-one travel app shows you the world’s most enticing travel destinations, gives you insider tips and plots your route, locations and photos when the journey is underway. The result? A beautiful digital world map that is unique to you! As well as the chance to turn it all into a hardback Travel Book when you’re done. And it doesn’t stop there...

Doesn’t drain your battery, works offline and you have full privacy control.

PLAN

■ Polarsteps Guides, created by our travel-loving editors and other explorers like you, show you the best of the world (as well as giving you top tips for once you get there).
■ Itinerary Planner to build your dream (editable) itinerary.
■ Transport Planner helping you get from A to B with clear transport options between destinations.

TRACK

■ Automatically track and plot your path on a digital world map (that grows fuller as your passport does).
■ Add photos, video, and thoughts to your steps along the way making your memories all the more vivid.
■ Save spots that you love so that you can always find your way back.

SHARE

■ Leave tips for the traveling community on where to go and what to see.
■ Share your journey with friends and family if you want to. Or keep it to yourself. You have full privacy controls.
■ Follow others and share in their adventures.

RELIVE

■ Retrace your steps – scrolling through places, photos, and your travel stats.
■ Create a unique Travel Book filled with your pictures and stories with the touch of a button.

WHAT THE PRESS ARE SAYING ABOUT POLARSTEPS

"The Polarsteps app replaces your travel journal, making it easier and more beautiful." - National Geographic

"Polarsteps helps you track and share your journeys in an easy and visually appealing way." - The Next Web

"Polarsteps' resulting travel log is impressive, and is the source of a severe case of itchy feet in your correspondent." - TechCrunch

FEEDBACK

Questions, thoughts, or feedback? We'd love to hear what you think about Polarsteps. Get in touch via support@polarsteps.com.

summary: Your trips on a map, itinerary planner, travel guides and epic photo books
reviews: A really good app for recording your journeys and holidays. Really simple and user friendly. | Great app for tracking! | Great way to track my travel. | Incredible app for tracking multi stop holidays / travels. Very simple to upload and crop photos and videos too. | While travelling it's a really great app to keep your friends and family updated where you are and what you're experiencing. I was able to send a link to those who I want to be able to read the blog. Polarstep is really easy to use and I really like it. | A fabulous tool to document your travel experiences! | Great app for sharing travel experiences with friends and family. Easy enough to use and edit, map showing places visited is very nice touch. Slight improvement could be to make uploading photos easier. | Great to follow loved ones | By limiting our posts to followers only, this app is a secure way to share travels with family members in real time. | Truly my favourite travel app. Spend some time on updating this as you travel and you will have the most amazing travel journal that you can print in hardback. cannot recommend this app enough! | When you have a traveller in the family, it's a great way to follow their experiences. | Love it ❤️ | It's a good app, I used it all along my travels and loved it. U can make little notes and pics alongside to keep a trace of what and where you've been. The only thing I'd like to notice is the impossibility to duplicate a trip you've done. It's not possible then to keep an original copy of your notes. | Great app as I'm not a FB person.. | Love using this app to track my journey and follow other friends A very useful app to create memories of places that you can share with your friends | Perfect | Great, easy way to record our travels and share with family and friends | Polarsteps, my travel companion! What an amazing app!! In the future you could add features to the travel stats like number of unesco world heritage sites visited and more. There's a lot of potential in this app. Please bring back the old flags design, those new flags in circle look strange in my opinion. | Brilliant app for keeping in touch with lived ones while travelling, for daily diary and for photo catalogue of trips. Excellent | I'm new to this app but it was recommended by friends and I'm loving it. | Great for recording and sharing trip details. | Really helps me capture the details of my holiday. It would help if it didn't jump back to the bottom after making an edit to the text. | Great app. Have used it for many years & really love it | Absolutely tedious. Someone recommended an app called Been but it got awful reviews on Android so I checked this one out instead. They're not really at all similar. This app is so tedious to input your locations of travel. It insists on you compiling your entire trio and adds in travel lines from point to point. Also there doesn't seem to be a way to just have one map up that shows all the places you've traveled, but instead you have to open each trip. The app lacks intuitiveness. | Great ap!! | Nice app to log your travels and make visible to your relatives | Can see exactly where my son was when travelling abroad. Very reassuring | Fantastic! | Great app to give family and friends a better idea as to where u are. Able to add pictures and also extra steps along the way. Quite happy user, although the down side is that i cannot reply to individual comments, only a general reply. Also I wanted to add that it would be great to be able to choose the mode of transport in between 2 distant points as it automatically defaults to plane even if it actually is a train travel. | Staat of valt met de inhoud natuurlijk. Maar een verademing in vergelijking met andere sociale media. | Love this app. I've been using it for years. Would be helpful if you could see a bigger photo when creating the book on a pc. The tiny picture isn't helpful! Even more helpful would be that you could edit the photo withing the website/app! | Excellent app for keeping our family updated on our travels. | Great app with good user experience to share my trip to my family and friends 👌 | A great app to see the travel blog and photos of family travelling in Asia. You can really zoom in to the exact location they are staying (I guess they have to be in an area with internet) | Polarsteps is a great way to record your travels, include photos and videos of what you have seen. A great way to share with your friends and relatives as they can track you on a map of the country you are travelling in. It would be great to be able to choose a mode of transport and also have a leaving time, not just arrival time. | Brilliant app and can't believe it is free. I have been using polar steps for about 3 years and it is a great app that does exactly what it is supposed to. I don't know how they can keep it free but if it wasn't I would pay for it. Our family follow our adventures every year and we love looking back on our travels to remind ourselves of what we have been up to. I highly recommend it. | My favourite travel tracker. Very easy to use. | Great app | Great for tracking your journey. | -Wonderful way of sharing the journey. | Interesting visualization of following somebody's journey. The UX however can and needs to be improved for editors. Multiple times I've lost some carefully drafted texts and had to start over again. Also numbering the Pictures and being able to include a short description would help the viewer to follow the journey. | Love the satellite tracking and travel stats. Very useful travel diary. Keeps friends and family up to date on your journey. | A great way to share our travelling experiences with family and friends. Text editing is a bit glitchy, but apart from that it's an easy system to use. | Great app. Easy user interface. Location service doesn't drain battery much at all. A little more functionality would be amazing but for a free app it ticks all the boxes. | It has taken a bit of time to get the hang of it.. But now find it really easy to use | It takes a bit of time to get used, but it's very good. | Great app, easy to use and upload photos and trip info. I particularly like that you can highlight recommendations too, such as restaurants, with links to apps such as Trip Advisor...brillisnt. I'm about to order an album too. To all the developers involved...5 Platinum stars. | Polarsteps has made documenting our Ultimate World Cruise fun. Great job Polarsteps. | Fantastic way to keep people at home updated on travels, additionally serving as an easy to use diary platform to help reflect on and digest your experiences. | All good 👍. | Great platform to record trip for friends and family, easy to use and navigate | Very addictive (in a good way) and greatly designed app. Tracking works very well and does not drain your battery. Otherwise I think it's a good app, | Great app. Recommended to friends and family | Love this app, family can follow and share our holiday. | I love this place that allows me to track my steps as i travel | Used it since 2022 and recorded about 5 trips. 10 days self drive round Iceland: On a cruise ship across the Atlantic; Cruise ship to Antarctica etc. To save data, you can post a few photos to mark the location first and upload more later. | Excellent | Until now, I am satisfied with the App. But I should say it's not easy at the beginning to understand how it works. | Excellent app | I've used the app for several years now and its functionality has improved in that time. It's a great alternative to FB for those who want to share or track travel info. | Fantastic way of following daughter's big trip | Works well and lovely to keep up with friends and family on their trips | I am enjoying Polarsteps 😉 | It's lit | My daughter is using Polarsteps to post about her travels and it is a great way for her to keep a record while also updating friends and family. | Some additional formatting options would be cool, bit it's clean, intuitive and no ads! | Love this app, it helped me keep track of where we'd been and what we'd seen. I know the save draft feature exists but it's too easy to forget. As an Android dev myself I know you can implement Activity restoration at least, and incremental auto save locally and server side should be a top priority! I'll give 5⭐ then! | Excellent idea, excellent app! Allows me to "remotely" travel with people I know (or sometimes don't know). Great way to see hidden corners of the world :) | Love this app. It allows for family to keep in touch, it is easy to use & provides a great record of your holidays. | Fun way to share stuff with friends and family, and also good to look back on! Easy in use! | Fantastic app, easy and fun to use. | Great app. Still using the app 5 years later. A wonderful way of documentingy travels, keeping in touch with friends and creating a great memory. Only sorry I can't locate my 2018/19 trip. | Love this app!! Great way to update a lot of people at the same time about your travels. My friends and family absolutely love it!! | Like traveling along, great! | Fantastic app for logging trips and journeys. Easy to use and share | 4.5 would be pretty accurate, overal great app that let's you share your adventures, and keep track of them for yourself. There are definitely some optimizations to be made, like how to upload pictures which aren't made with your phone. Edit for clarity: you can upload pictures from other folders/albums, it's just more tedious to do so. The app sometimes rejects one of the pictures (maybe a format issue?) and then it fails to upload all selected pictures. Then the user needs to upload the 1by1 | Love, love, love! The only thing I wish this app did differently, is I wish I could add captions to each photo instead of only one caption per step. Otherwise, it's a really cool way to build a memoir of our trip and share it in real-time with friends and family! | Great way of sharing a trip with friends and family in one place. | Great app, however it's auto added a stop in the middle of the Atlantic ocean I never went to that I can't delete. Whenever I go to edit step, it says 'could not load api'. | Excellent way to follow our family on their travels | On the whole this app has done me proud, but it's unpredictable. When I've diminished it to check a fact, everything I've written has disappeared when I pull it up again. Sometimes it won't let me continue editing and only offers Publish. I've had to reload photos on a number of occasions. Telling me what was on my bucket list was unnecessarily intrusive. In summary, when the app works it's very good indeed and my followers are delighted but software issues still need more work perhaps. | Great way to capture travel memories. Printed albums are easily generated and are a memory for years! | Fun, easy to use and fantastic for all travellers :) | Fantastic way to track and share our travels with friends and family | Best app for journaling your travels on the go. The guides are also really handy for inspiration on what to See, where to Stay and Eat. Super easy to share a web link to friends and family | My favourite travel blog app! | 4.5 stars - app is intuitive to use and provides nice platform to upload pictures / videos and add a little description. Super easy to share with friends & family so they can like & comment. Only suggestion I'd like to see as improvement: for travelling between two locations I'd love to set or adjust the transportation used | Great app and so easy to use. Love the map it produces and the longitude and latitude markings. Family and friends love to follow our travels, and you have the added bonus of a travel book to purchase if you wish. Personally, it's a great aid to my photo album journalling later | Superb | This is a fabulous place to keep track of your trips and share your journey with friends and family. | great way to update close ones on a travelling journey, and very good UI when it comes to making 'steps'. I would only add some 'flexibility'. When swiping through photos of one step, a strong swipe makes it that you go to the next step and therefore skip video/photos unintentionally. | The best app for keeping friends and family updates on your travels. Beautiful UI, super easy to use and doesn't destroy your battery life like some trackers. | Polarsteps is a great way to keep track of one's trip and for friends and family to follow | I found the interface initially confusing as I am using both my phone and tablet for content. I got the hang of it after a couple of goes! You can always edit and republish! | Very fun way of keeping on track with my travelling friends. | Travel with friends and family with Polarsteps | Quel bonheur de suivre et d'être suivi par la famille et les amis ! Et de beaux souvenirs conservés. Ça a remplacé notre carnet papier de voyage (gain de place! Hehe). Seul bémol, pour les très longs voyages, la création d'un livre n'est pas supporté au delà de 6000 photos. Et pas possibilité de couper le voyage en plusieurs sections et donc albums. | Brilliant way to write and share a travel blog. | It is so easy to use and a great way to keep in touch on an adventure. | Such a cool way to keep a diary of your travels | Fun to track loved ones on their travels | Happy as a user and consumer ;) | Parfait pour organiser son parcours et le documenter! | Easy to post and update. It would be even nicer if one could add descriptions at individual photos. | Really easy and fun way to track your adventures 👍 | It's a very simple app to use. I use it for family to track and take part in our travels. | Tracks the whole trip through the map. Great way to share with and follow friends. | I signed up to follow my niece's travel. The App encourages me to put in trips. I do not need the app for this. It annoys me that I can't simply get my niece's travel info. | I'm loving being able follow my family on their trip. The dots on the map help me to understand where they are in the country which is especially useful. | Great way to follow a journey anywhere in the world | Easy to learn, precise and easy to share, very well thought of. | Really great to share trips or follow relatives on their travels! | Very practical | Love it | I don't travel much but this is a brilliant way to keep my family members up to date! | Wonderful to see my brothers travel photos on this app easy and so quick . You can show all your friends where you are in the world without filling up their phone with photos . Just click on this app definitely recommend Polar Steps | Such an easy way to track a trip without resorting to Instagram! | Great to keep track of travels and where we've been | An incredible app run by an exceptional team! User for many years on a road trip of a lifetime and slowly editing the pieces together to get my first travel book 😍 | handy app to keep track of your trips just needs a little time to log your stops | Absolutely fantastic | Does not recognise many middle eastern cities like Dubai and Abu Dhabi. Hideous. | Easy to use, easy to let friends and family follow.
recentChanges:
- Explore the adventures of your friends! Follow more friends via the suggested friend feature and find “friends of friends” who also use Polarsteps.
- We have refreshed the experience of adding and editing your trips in the app.
- Lastly, as always, we also fixed some bugs.
comments: ["Absolutely tedious. Someone recommended an app called Been but it got awful reviews on Android so I checked this one out instead. They're not really at all similar. This app is so tedious to input your locations of travel. It insists on you compiling your entire trio and adds in travel lines from point to point. Also there doesn't seem to be a way to just have one map up that shows all the places you've traveled, but instead you have to open each trip. The app lacks intuitiveness.","I use this app for tracking where I've been. It's very useful and cool. Easy to use, intuitive. I haven't tried the more advanced features but based on how well the app works overall, I would expect them to work very well. I took one star off after my last trip because of the app's tendency to go to sleep for hours, leaving long straight lines that don't capture the detail of an otherwise complex route, which is unfortunate.","I am using PolarSteps for the first time and am loving it. I don't have data on this trip and the app still is able to identify where I've been. There's so much this app does. I've been sharing it with other travelers as well. Some things I would like the developers to consider moving forward. Ability to: *add contributors so all on trip can participate *add captions to pictures *rearrange actual steps We are still traveling, so I will have to come back to review the photo book. ❤️ this app","I love this app, not only to share my travels with family and friends but also to look back myself! I would love it if pictures could be placed on maps automatically (from the photo meta data) - strava has been doing that for years! I'd really like to add past trips, especially backpacking trips, for which I didn't have my phone on, but it's too much work to do it manually.","i love this app! couple thoughts:. it would be great if you added a feature to drop a \"waypoint\". it's not actually a step that you document but it does you to more accurately Mark a path. the second option would be to make points on the journey moveable. sometimes the app puts a point thats not accurate. would love the oportunuty to move it."]
